name: @g-1/devtools
description: G1 Development Tools - Monorepo containing util, workflow, and test packages

scripts.build: bun --cwd packages/util run build && bun --cwd packages/workflow run build && bun --cwd packages/test run build
scripts.test: bun --cwd packages/util run test && bun --cwd packages/workflow run test && bun --cwd packages/test run test
scripts.test:ci: bun --cwd packages/util run test:ci && bun --cwd packages/workflow run test:ci && bun --cwd packages/test run test:ci
scripts.lint: bun --cwd packages/util run lint && bun --cwd packages/workflow run lint && bun --cwd packages/test run lint
scripts.lint:fix: bun --cwd packages/util run lint:fix && bun --cwd packages/workflow run lint:fix && bun --cwd packages/test run lint:fix
scripts.typecheck: bun --cwd packages/util run typecheck && bun --cwd packages/workflow run typecheck && bun --cwd packages/test run typecheck
scripts.clean: bun --cwd packages/util run clean && bun --cwd packages/workflow run clean && bun --cwd packages/test run clean
scripts.dev: bun --cwd packages/util run dev & bun --cwd packages/workflow run dev & bun --cwd packages/test run dev & wait
scripts.size-check: bun --cwd packages/util run size-check && bun --cwd packages/workflow run size-check && bun --cwd packages/test run size-check
scripts.analyze: bun --cwd packages/util run analyze && bun --cwd packages/workflow run analyze && bun --cwd packages/test run analyze
scripts.ci:optimized: bun run typecheck && bun run test:ci && bun run build && bun run size-check && bun run analyze
